rules_text:
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Dark Thought-Thief.
Blight {2}{W}{UB} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {2}{W}{UB}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Whenever a creature you control dies, exile it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card for each card you own in exile and each permanent you control but don’t own.
